summary: A Flax (JAX) implementation of the ELECTRA model tailored for token classification tasks, providing forward computation, loss handling, and output structures for sequence labeling applications such as named entity recognition.
business_intent: Allow developers to leverage a pre‑trained ELECTRA model within high‑performance JAX/Flax environments to perform token‑level NLP tasks, enabling efficient deployment of NER, POS tagging, and similar sequence labeling solutions.
